resources.string: "CumulusTV is an app that lets you create custom channels that can be played through the Live Channels app. Don't know what to watch? Pick a suggested channel."

You can create a JSON file on Google Drive and have your channels synced across all your devices. Edits on your PC will also change them on this device, as long as you change the `modified` attribute.
You can browse the source code on GitHub and report any issues you find or suggest a feature. Have a problem with the JSON? You can browse the format there.
"After creating channels, go to the Live Channels app. You'll have to make sure your channels are setup. Then, pick the channels you want visible."
